attributes.action: Put more funding into children’s mental health services.
attributes.additional_details: The waiting list for mental health services are so long and children’s lives are at risk children’s are dieing, suffering and not getting the help they need and deserve because mental health services are understaffed and under funded .
attributes.background: Put more funding into children’s mental health services and make mental health more normal to be spoken about and there not be such a stigma around it
